name: WACKER速 Catalyst T 79
description: WACKER速 Catalyst T 79 is the designated curing agent for ELASTOSIL速 RT 779 silicone rubber from WACKER. This shear-thinning paste offers outstanding adhesion properties and enhances the oil resistance of ELASTOSIL速 RT 779. The curing speed can be adjusted by altering the mixing ratio. Additionally, it provides excellent adhesion to a wide range of substrates, such as glass, ceramics, wood, metals, plastics, and powder coatings.
